# 중회귀모형 테스트

```{r}
market2=read.table("./data/market2.txt", header=T)
head(market2, 3)
X=market2[,2:3]
X=cbind(1,X)
Y=market2[,4]
X=as.matrix(X)
Y=as.matrix(Y)
XTX=t(X)%*%X
XTXI=solve(XTX)
XTY=t(X)%*%Y
beta=round(XTXI%*%XTY, 3)

```
- 적합된 회귀식
$$\begin{aligned}
\hat{Y}&=\hat{\beta_0} + \hat{\beta_1}X_1 + \hat{\beta_2}X_2
\\&=0.850 + 1.558X_1 + 0.427X_2
\end{aligned}$$
